uk.ac.ucl.cs.gc01.restaurant_billing_system.objects

Class OrderItems

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ucl.cs.gc01.restaurant_billing_system.objects.OrderItems

  • public class OrderItems
extends java.lang.Object

    The OrderItems class represents the different details contained in an order as well as the details about the items in those orders. Each instance variable corresponds to a column of the order details table joined with the fooditems tables in the database.

    Fields:
    • String foodItem
    • int quantity
    • double rate
    • String specialRequests
    • String comments
    Author:
    Miguel Marin Vermelho

    • Constructor Detail

      • OrderItems

        public OrderItems(java.lang.String foodItem,
                  int quantity,
                  double rate,
                  java.lang.String specialRequests,
                  java.lang.String comments)
        Constructor:

        Generates an OrderItems object with a specified foodItem description, foodItem quantity, rate, special requests and comments.

        Parameters:
        foodItem - - the food item description.
        quantity - - the quantity of the specified food item to add.
        rate - - the price of a single food item.
        specialRequests - - special requests attached to order.
        comments - - comments attached to order.
